page.title: 17TRAFFIC THRU TARRANT HINTON
page.content: Four of us,Karl,Paul,Wayne and me Matthew,did a traffic survey at Tarrant Hinton.We sat at the side of the A354 main road between Salisbury and Blandford and two of us counted the traffic going to Salisbury and the other two counted the traffic going to Blandford.We timed ourselvesand spent an hour counting.In the hour going to Salisbury there were 118 cars,17 lorries,10 vans,3 motorcycles,3 buses and 3 bikes while going to Blandford were 90 cars,10 lorries,5 vans,3 motorcycles,2 bikes and 3 farm vehicles.We expected more traffic but perhaps because it was mid morning 10.30 to 11.30 am and a Tuesday the traffic was light.We thought that there would be more tractors as there are so many farms but perhaps they use farm tracks instead.
